name: Propelling Shield
description: Create a protective sphere over your location that reduces damage from siege weapons by 50%. Does not affect Leap, Move Position, and Pull abilities.  Also increases the range of abilities with a range greater than 20 meters by 7 meters.
effectLines: Costs less and allies in the shield gain increased range.
rawDescription:
Create a protective sphere over your location that reduces damage from siege weapons by <<1>>%. Does not affect Leap, Move Position, and Pull abilities.

Also increases the range of abilities with a range greater than |cffffff20|r meters by <<2>>.
